#: starts mouse simulator which allows to generate multi-touch like the ios simulator
defines the maximum touches 1 grid item has. this is used to offset the pointer IDs for grids.

grid.#: Example for Full HD HID Overlay. Uncomment the 'id' property to enable.
to figure out the device it, look in the console output for entries like:
2015-06-25 16:43:32.819 AEM Screens[96784:1219741] Registered touch device with id: location-0x14500000
Example for 2nd Full HD HID Overlay. Uncomment and configure the 'id' property to enable.
Example for 3rd Full HD HID Overlay. Uncomment and configure  the 'id' property to enable.
Example for Portrait Full HD HID Overlay. Uncomment and configure  the 'id' property to enable.
Example for PQLabs Overlay. Uncomment the 'host' property to enable.
Example for Multitaction Overlay. Uncomment the 'host' property to enable.
Example for HID Overlay. Uncomment the 'id' property to enable.
